alert.note: Alert for Benton; Decatur; Henderson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 11:44AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Henderson, southeastern Benton and Decatur Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1143 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Natchez Trace State Forest to near Decaturville. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Natchez Trace State Park, Natchez Trace State Forest, Parsons, Decaturville, Darden, Montgomery, Scotts Hill, Busseltown, Jeannette, Haney, Rock Hill, Pleasant Grove, Mount Tabor, Sugar Tree, Red Walnut, Timberlake, Cozette, Thurman and Lick Skillet. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
